data.text:
According to AFRAA, Addis Ababa Bole International Airport ranked first by passenger traffic in 2020. A total of 5.5million passengers have been transported through ADD Airport in 2020. Of this traffic, Ethiopian Airlines transported  5.2million passengers.
#FlyEthiopian https://t.co/RC5jBxTYbg
@justtamich Dear  @justtamich, We are very sorry for the inconvenience. Please DM us details of the case.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: Ethiopian Airlines has started operating flights with fully vaccinated crew against COVID-19 to keep travelers safe in light of the pandemic. Read more at https://t.co/d6m3a5kacG https://t.co/KIewkQsnrn

Thank you for sharing. 
#ETmoments #WindowViewWednesday https://t.co/cs7gx1sAJ3

We are pleased to announce the resumption of our flight to Asmara effective 23 June, 2021.
#FlyEthiopian https://t.co/XqwT0OqmC3

While most airlines cancelled their flights during the pandemic, Ethiopian Airlines kept operating.

https://t.co/yrQ9AKsL7i https://t.co/LVWVCoO5qN

urls.title: Extra baggage
urls.description: You aren' t registered yet? Join the program for free and start enjoying the benefits for flights made 90 days back. Excess and Special Baggage Purchase additional baggage at ethiopianairlines.com. You can also purchase it from Ethiopian ticketing offices, Ethiopian Global Contact Center, Ethiopian agents and Ethiopian Airport. If you have already booked a flight with Ethiopian, you can purchase your excess baggage using MANAGE BOOKING Ethiopian Airlines Baggage Policy for Excess baggage rate. Learn
